abusefilter-edit-builder-funcs-ccnorm-co: Normalise and search a string for multiple substrings in OR mode (ccnorm_contains_any)
Normalise and search a string for multiple substrings in AND mode (ccnorm_contains_all)
abusefilter-edit-builder-funcs-sanitize: Normalise HTML entities into unicode characters (sanitise)
abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-file-bits-: Bits per colour channel of the file
